name: [JAM] ShootrunningArena
description:
ShootrunningArena was born as a weekend jam project. I'm stealing some ideas from it for a new action game, but may revisit this prototype (and its odd control scheme) and add new enemy types at some point.

It's an action game played only with the mouse.
Rounds are short and difficult.
Avoid the enemies. Shoot the enemies.
Follow the directions and you'll do just fine.
Good luck.

Placeholder Music:
https://seaofaland.bandcamp.com/album/morning-star...
